title: New Times, New Hell - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life   Supernatural
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Adapted to Manhua   Boss-Subordinate Relationship   Business Management   Calm Protagonist   Daoism   Dense Protagonist   First Love   First-time Interc**rse   Ghosts   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Heartwarming   Hell   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Older Love Interests   Persistent Love Interests   Possessive Characters   Programmer   Reincarnation   Salaryman   Slow Romance   Straight Uke   Strong Love Interests   Tsundere   Zombies
author: Lin Zhiluo   林知落
description:
Yu Zhengdu joined a small start-up company that claimed to offer “life management services”……as a programmer.

On his first day in office, he received a phone call from a stranger: “Hello, I received a text message from your company that informed me of my reincarnation tomorrow……”

Yu Zhengdu: “……??”

Shang Que, the beautiful little boss, said, “New employee, welcome to the Hell organisation in the human world. A thousand years ago, I was known to the human world as the Ghost King of Luofeng Mountain.”

Yu Zhengdu: “……??” From then on, he was incredibly distressed about the development of Hell.>
